name: Compliance Due in Next 30 Days
query:
SELECT
    COUNT(name) AS total
FROM `tabFactory Regulatory Register`
WHERE
    category = 'Compliance'
    AND compliance_status = 'Pending'
    AND docstatus = 1
    AND MONTH(posting_date) = MONTH(CURDATE())
    AND YEAR(posting_date) = YEAR(CURDATE());
